about_the_game:
CSX: It is one of North America’s “Super Six” freight railroads with more than 20,000 route miles stretching through 23 U. S states and two Canadian provinces.

Now, CSX Scenario Pack 02, from developer High Iron Simulations, brings the drama and diversity of CSX railroading to Train Simulator with ten authentic career scenarios that re-create the railroading of CSX and its predecessors on three popular Train Simulator routes!

With CSX Scenario Pack 02, you’ll experience realistic and challenging freight railroading on the B&O Mountain Subdivision: Cumberland - Grafton route; CSX Hanover Subdivision: Hanover - Hagerstown route; and Clinchfield Railroad: Elkhorn City - St. Paul route, and you’ll climb aboard four types of potent CSX second- and third-generation CSX diesel locomotives!

In ten career scenarios that range in era from the early days of CSX to contemporary operations, the experiences that await you in CSX Scenario Pack 02 include:

  • On the extraordinary Train Simulator B&O Mountain Subdivision: Cumberland - Grafton route, you’ll handle heavy coal tonnage through the Alleghenies with CSX EMD SD45-2s, tote empty coal gondolas with GE’s massive AC6000CWs, and work local and switching duty aboard one of CSX’s unique SD40-3 rebuilt diesels.
  • On the scenic Clinchfield route deep in the Appalachian Mountains of Kentucky and Virginia, you’ll recall CSX predecessors Clinchfield, Family Lines, and Seaboard Coast Line as you battle heavy coal tonnage and take the throttle of Clinchfield’s famed Train 97, the “Florida Perishable” fast freight.
  • On the history-rich CSX Hanover Subdivision in Pennsylvania and Maryland, you’ll handle manifest freight traffic, lug a heavy “Rock Runner” stone train, and work local duties aboard EMD SD45-2, GE Dash 8-40CW, and rebuilt SD40-3 locomotives.

The ten career scenarios of CSX Scenario Pack 02, based closely on actual railroad operations and train symbols, offer a remarkable opportunity to experience realistic CSX freight railroading across the nearly four decades since the super railroad was created in 1986.

Experience the extraordinary railroading of one of North America’s railroading titans – with High Iron Simulations’ action-packed CSX Scenario Pack 02!

Included Scenarios

  • Fairmont Sub Coal, Pt. 1
  • Fairmont Sub Coal, Pt. 2
  • Empties Westward
  • Hampshire Subdivision Haul
  • New McClure Coal
  • Big Sandy Coal
  • CRR Second 97
  • CSX Early Days
  • CSX Rock Runner Turn
  • Passage Through History

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2022 User Guide.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator 2022 User Guide.
